description: Whether you're trying to watch your weight or just looking for a healthier cocktail choice, White Wine Spritzer is the perfect drink for you.This low-calorie cocktail is made with&nbsp;white wine and&nbsp;club soda, making it a revitalizing and guilt-free choice. So next time you're looking for something to sip on, skip the sugary drinks and go for a White Wine Spritzer instead. You'll be glad you did!
name: White Wine Spritzer
recipeIngredient: .75 glass of very chilled White wine
.75 glass of very chilled Club soda

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the wine to fill half the wine glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the wine to fill half the wine glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with lime on the rim.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with lime on the rim.
